title: The Divergence Theorem, a visual explanation

media:group.media:title: The Divergence Theorem, a visual explanation
media:group.media:description:
This video talks about the divergence theorem, one of the fundamental theorems of multivariable calculus. The divergence theorem relates a flux integral to a triple integral. 

Green's Theorem: https://youtu.be/8SwKD5_VL5o
Line Integrals:  https://youtu.be/dnGDmZynvYY
